products.shortDescription: AppleCare+ for iMac extends your repair coverage and technical support to three years from the original purchase date of your MacBook. It also adds coverage for up to two incidents of accidental damage from handling every 12 months, service fee plus applicable tax. In addition, you'll get 24/7 priority access to Apple experts via chat or phone.
